title: Account Issue
body:
Hello

I forgot my password and can not even find my e-mail address registered on the account...

Is there any other ways that I can find? or I wanna know my e-mail address at least.

Thank you.

replies.body: Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking "I need help recovering my account". Once you're verified as the creator of the account, those agents will be able to get you straightened out in no time!
